title: Structured House
description: Build a well-structured house using variables and relational values. Apply everything you've learned about variables to create an organized drawing!

title: Sprouting Flower
description: Create a beautiful animation of a flower sprouting and growing using state and colors. Bring nature to life with code!

title: Rainbow Ball
description: Create a bouncing rainbow ball using conditionals and state. Combine colors and movement for a dynamic animation!

title: Caesar Cipher
description: Implement the classic Caesar cipher encryption using multiple functions working together. Encode and decode secret messages!

title: Acronym
description: Convert phrases into their acronym form using advanced loops. Practice breaking down strings and building results!

title: Alien Detector
description: Build an alien detector using arrays. Search through data to find hidden aliens!

title: Matching Socks
description: Match pairs of socks from a pile using arrays. Practice collecting and comparing array elements!

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: Build a tic tac toe game using dictionaries. Track game state and determine winners!

title: Sieve of Eratosthenes
description: Implement the Sieve of Eratosthenes algorithm to find prime numbers using dictionaries!

title: Emoji Collector
description: Collect and organize emojis using dictionaries. Build and query your emoji collection!
